full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation Number
WS4596849986

#### Publication Date
June 12, 2024

#### Closing Date
July 4, 2024, 2:00 PM

#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified offerors to provide and deliver Grade Liquid Aluminum Sulfate.

#### Background
Canada is seeking to procure Liquid Aluminum Sulfate for the Department of National Defence. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.

#### Requirements
Bidders who wish to request a debriefing must do so within 15 working days from receiving notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

#### Solicitation Documents
The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can be accessed by logging into your SAP Ariba account and completing your Government of Canada profile.

#### Award Criteria
The following trade agreements apply:
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement

#### End User
The End User is the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Contact Information
Contracting Authority: Genevieve Petten
Telephone: Not Provided
Email: [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Region
The delivery will be made to New Brunswick.

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
Contact: Genevieve Petten, genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19997298?extsite=MTk5OTcyOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
[Self-Serv Account Required](
